Quickstrike:











Quickstrike groaned to himself, with his pain, and sat down. But the instant 
his leg bent, he screamed. He leaned to the side and held his leg wounded 
leg out.

The next time he saw Sinester, he would shoot him for that shot for his 
damaged leg. That was a lousy shot. And a shot for the new Predacon leader. 
He now had to have more respect than that. He could have bots killed. By his 
orders or always by himself. He preferred by his own "hands". But killing 
someone now wouldn't work well, mainly because his body wasn't working well.

He needed to find his troops now. And most of all, he needed repairs. Badly.

He held his head over his lap and groaned loudly. He grumbled a few things. 
He could again see the open wound on his leg. On the edge of the foot long 
wound, were singe marks. He didn't want to move now. That dumb bot Sinester 
cause him much inconvenice. That brace restricted some pain.
